text: I was fortunate to speak with Iverson before he died. Although he was an incredibly brilliant man, it took a long time for him to realize that mere mortals had a lot of difficulty with his invented glyphs for APL, and he recast it in a new language called J which was his attempt to counterattack against Mathematica, which is the dominant math tool.

elements.text: I was fortunate to speak with Iverson before he died. Although he was an incredibly brilliant man, it took a long time for him to realize that mere mortals had a lot of difficulty with his invented glyphs for APL, and he recast it in a new language called J which was his attempt to counterattack against Mathematica, which is the dominant math tool.
